transcend.4_1:

transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Shark Attack!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>7%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

description: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Sharks Are Friends
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> and reduces the duration of debuffs by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_2_1]</color> and reduces the duration of debuffs by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Wakey-Wakey
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to surviving allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all slain allies. Afterward, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
description: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to surviving allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000054_3_3] turn(s)</color>, then <color=#28d9ed>Resurrects (Greater)</color> all slain allies. Afterward, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_3_2]</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>13%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_backup_1_1]</color>.
